articles.author: Ujval Nanavati
articles.title: Havells's biggest bet loses steam - The Morning Context
articles.description: The Lloyd acquisition, which was supposed to catapult the electricals giant into the consumer durables segment, has missed expectations. But chairman Anil Rai Gupta has only just doubled down on the brand. Will the risk pay off?

articles.title: Dalal Street indices wobble with global weakness - The Economic Times
articles.description: The next major support for the Nifty is at 19,161, which is the 50-Day Exponential Moving Average for the index, said Ashwin Ramani, derivatives & technical analyst at Samco Securities.
